snippet: The league and the players’ union were ordered into settlement negotiations concerning the Minnesota running back’s suspension.
abstract: Magistrate Judge Janie Mayeron orders NFL and NFL Players Assn to enter settlement negotiations in case over Adrian Peterson's suspension from the Minnesota Vikings; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The league and the players’ union were ordered into settlement negotiations concerning the Minnesota running back’s suspension.

headline.main: Judge Orders Meeting in Adrian Peterson Case
headline.print_headline: Judge Orders Meeting in Peterson Case
